text: "Tossing and Turning" is a song and single written by John Carter, Ken Lewis and Perry Ford and performed by The Ivy League. Released in 1965 it reached 3, on the UK Singles Chart, staying there for 13 weeks. It was the group's biggest hit. It was also the group's only hit in the US making 83 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:1965 songs Category:1965 singles Category:British pop songs Category:Piccadilly Records singles Category:Songs written by John Carter (musician) Category:Songs written by Ken Lewis (songwriter) Category:The Ivy League (band) songs
title: Tossing and Turning (The Ivy League song)
